scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi semi-cursive script of the 15th century. Ya῾aḳov Binyamin: his name showed in the acrostic of 10 lines following the colophon on folio 167r; the name Ya῾aḳov marked off throughout the manuscript: folio 97v, 101r, 169r.
